features: Ultra-durable, multi-directional wheels stored in a heavy-duty wheel housing keep you rolling along anywhere your life takes you
Interior compression straps and pockets offer the perfect way to organize your bag and make the most of the packing space
A vertical quick stash pocket helps keep important items within reach
Maintaining your luggage is important to its longevity. With the Bi-Tech™ Armor Lite material, the AWD 30 will continue to perform long after your other bags have been retired
The fabric blocking material covers scuffs and stains, and helps your bag maintain a fresh look, even after some years of travel
When you find you need to pack some extra gear, the expansion zipper offers the additional carrying capacity you need
The lockable zippers and Central Lock Point with Secure Zip™ Toggles allow for an excellent security feature against unwanted people easily accessing your luggage
With multiple external lash points, you can carry additional gear or even secure your bag to the roof of a car if needed
Fabric blocking material helps hide stains and scuffs from being easily visible
Eagle Creek has a dedication to safety, and the reflective accents could make sure you are visible at night while other bags might not be
You’ll have peace of mind knowing your purchase is covered with our No Matter What™ Warranty
